TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AddressFilterMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of match semantics used by the dispatcher to route incoming messages to the correct endpoint.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The value of the AddressFilterMode enumeration is set on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AddressFilterMode%2A> property.
The longest prefix match criterion specified by Prefix requires that the destination address be matched by the largest number of leading address bits in the filter. The default value is Exact.
## Examples [!code-vb[S_UE_AddressFilter#0](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.servicemodel.ad_1.vb)] [!code-cs[S_UE_AddressFilter#0](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.ad_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode Any = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates a filter that matches on any address of an incoming message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Using this value turns off the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] address filter check. Any message, no matter what its WS-Adressing:To identity is accepted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode Exact = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates a filter that does an exact match on the address of an incoming message.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode Prefix = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates a filter does the longest prefix matches on the address of an incoming message.
